author: FireAndRescueAcademy
description: Comprehensive sanctions management system for alliance members with full tracking, statistics, and MemberSync integration.
install_msg: Thanks for installing SanctionsManager! Configure channels with `[p]sanctionset` and post the button with `[p]sanctionset post`. Requires MemberSync cog for full functionality.
short: Alliance sanctions management with tracking and statistics
name: SanctionsManager
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs, Missionchief user IDs, usernames, sanction details, and admin actions in a local SQLite database for moderation tracking purposes.
